description: Get the template you want to use for creating a migration workflow.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the template.

nested_items.name: templateArn
nested_items.description: >The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the migration workflow template. The format for an Migration Hub Orchestrator template ARN is arn:aws:migrationhub-orchestrator:region:account:template/template-abcd1234. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the AWS General Reference.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The time at which the template was last created.

nested_items.name: inputs
nested_items.description: The inputs provided for the creation of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: inputName
nested_items.description: The name of the template.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: The data type of the template input.

nested_items.name: required
nested_items.description: Determine if an input is required from the template.

nested_items.name: tools
nested_items.description: List of AWS services utilized in a migration workflow.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of an AWS service.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL of an AWS service.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the template was last created.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the migration workflow template.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the template.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message of retrieving migration workflow templates.

nested_items.name: templateClass
nested_items.description: The class of the migration workflow template. The available template classes are:
A2C.
MGN.
SAP_MULTI.
SQL_EC2
SQL_RDS.
VMIE.
(string) ---
(string) ---
